thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Heungkong Holding Plans Equity Investment Fund, Share Trade To Resume

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Heungkong Holding Plans Equity Investment Fund, Share Trade To Resume

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen heungkong holding co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Heungkong Holding Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST 200 MILLION YUAN ($30.75 million) TO SET UP EQUITY INVESTMENT FUND WITH PARTNERS
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON JAN 12 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2AOR6f5 ; bit.ly/2CShB55 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5050 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
